app.description: Textbelt is a no-nonsense SMS API built for developers who just want to send SMS. Thousands of customers prefer Textbelt over other SMS providers for our ease of setup, simple, predictable pricing packages, and personal support

statusText.invalid_responder_app: Provided app does not exist or does not support responding to text messages
statusText.failed_to_fetch_quota: Failed to fetch url. Status code: {statusCode}
statusText.failed_to_get_quota: Failed to get remaining quota or quota is zero
statusText.error_sending_sms: Error sending text message via TextBelt

apiKey.max: TextBelt API key must be at most 256 characters long
